text:
Overall the Charmers' trip to Key West trip to celebrate Cameran Eubanks' birthday was a success. Although the non-stop drinking and sun did take their toll on some, so back in Charleston once the gang was refreshed they reconvened at Sermet's farewell party. Check out the Charmers and their glamorous looks below...

How to Watch Watch Southern Charm on Bravo Thursdays at 9/8c and next day on Peacock. Catch up on the Bravo App.
title: Photos: Go Inside the Southern Charm Season 4 Finale
